long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your powerful propellers chop furiously at the air above as you spew a torrent of bullets at an endless procession of enemies in this Great Air Battles game. Wipe the sweat from your eyes, pilot, because you will need every millisecond to stay alive. Blast your way through the enemy ranks, outmaneuver their attacks and snag supply drops for points.
